definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.chinese: 明知不可能获胜，他们还是进行了拼争。

sentences.english: Their advantage is great, but we will continue to fight.
sentences.chinese: 国米的优势很大，但我们会继续拼争。

definition: lit. you fight, I snatch (idiom); to compete fiercely offering no quarter/fierce rivalry/tug-of-war
to strive for mastery (idiom); aiming for the best result/to have high ambitions
to grapple (with the enemy)/to fight at the risk of one's life
survival/the struggle to eke out a living/to seek for continued existence
to obtain by an effort/to strive to get sth
lit. you die, I live (idiom); irreconcilable adversaries/two parties cannot coexist
